channel.title: My server help :S
channel.description: Okay.. im going to come right out for the help.. i am making a hamachi server and would like to know if anyone can help me. The problem is that when i try to post my server on the server status page it says my server is not online.. but it is. and i dont know what to do please help me :cool:

item.title: My server help :S
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

What server are you using. Double check your No-IP DUC is on and the IP is checked, then check it’s correctly been implemented in to the client (the no-ip address), and that the ports are the same for both the server and client.

People won’t be able to connect if they don’t have the right client. It’s hard to establish the problem without being at your computer to be honest. Just keep trying, don’t give up.

Read full topic

item.title: My server help :S
item.dc:creator: @pking4lyfe pking4lyfe
item.description:
@pking4lyfe wrote:

well… ive tryed doing it the other way… and it wont let anyone connect… ive portforwarded correctly for a linksys router… and it still wont let anyone connect… so i just gave up and put it on a hamachi server
